text: Milena Dravić (; ; 5 October 1940 – 14 October 2018) was a Serbian actress and dancer. She was born in Belgrade. At an early age, she was a ballerina. Dravić was known for her roles in Destination Death, Special Treatment, and St. George Shoots the Dragon. Dravić died on 14 October 2018 from pancreatic cancer in Belgrade at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Complete filmography at the Complete Index to World Film * Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dancers Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Actors from Belgrade
title: Milena Dravić
